prompt:
Write a letter to your favorite author expressing gratitude for their work and asking them to write another book in the same genre as one of their previous bestsellers.
Dear J.K. Rowling, I just finished reading the seventh Harry Potter book, "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows". It brought back so many memories from my childhood when I first started reading about the magical world of Hogwarts. Thank you for creating such a captivating series that has touched the hearts of millions around the globe. As a die-hard fan, I would be ever grateful if you could write another book in the same genre as one of your previous bestsellers, perhaps something related to the Marauders or Dumbledore's early years. I look forward to seeing what magical adventure awaits me next time I open up your pages. Yours truly,
[Name of GPT user]
